SEARCH

Package com.oracle.truffle.api.provider

package com.oracle.truffle.api.provider
This package contains a provider to instantiate a Truffle language. The Truffle language provider is not intended to be implemented directly by a language developer, rather the implementation is generated by the Truffle DSL.
Since:
23.1
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.oracle.truffle.api
    Do you want to implement your own Truffle based language? In such case start here.

    Class
    Description
    InternalResourceProvider
    Used to register an optional InternalResource using a ServiceLoader.

    Used to register a TruffleLanguage using a ServiceLoader.
